attributes.action: Allow members of the public to report drivers using mobile phones
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The number of drivers using mobile phones seems to be on the increase. Van drivers and younger women drivers seem to be the worst offenders.  The police should accept photographic evidence of the offender on the phone while driving including their registration.  This evidence would need to be supplied by a passenger in another vehicle - car or bus, or a pedestrian.
